resources.string: Please note: If an expense is under multiple tags then the expense will be counted under first tag in which it is associated. Eg say if pizza is tagged under food and party then it will be displayed under food section only.
These expenses will not be automatically added, this will popup as a notification for you to review or discard.
Expendio - An Expense management app powered by just dictating your expenses. Thriwin Solutions
No email app available. Please manually send mail to muralidharan.nandhakumar@gmail.com
Please input a day from 1-28. If not it will be defaulted to day 1. If start day is changed in between an expense month, it will affect all entries after this change.
Please input value from 0 - 23, If not it will be defaulted to 8 PM i.e. 20 hrs
Reset of all your expenses, tags and recurring expenses.
Do you want expendio to remind you for filling any expenses?
Do you want to enable SMS based expense suggestion
All sms phrases and preferences saved successfully
Please update sms phrases in such a way to uniquely identify your sms from your bank. These phrases will be used as hint to identify and help find your expenses from messages.
SMS based expense suggestion will not work if you don\'t provide permission.

Please follow the instruction when you set the sms phrases.

 1. Use phrases from your bank smses to uniquely identify the message 

 2. You can use comma separated values to define sms phrases, so that only if all phrases matches it will be considered for processing
